attributes.action: Submit to Her Majesty an award to Phil Collins, the musician, an MBE or a knighthood for his services to the music industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Phil Collins is an icon in the music indusry.Since 1970 he has evolved as part of a legendary group ( genesis ) and as a solo artist.He is a brilliant live performer, and his music has had an impact that deserves recognition.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
